price: „сигурно ћу свима, тобом и онима који се буду повели за тобом, да напуним Пакао!“
arabic: لَأَمۡلَأَنَّ جَهَنَّمَ مِنكَ وَمِمَّن تَبِعَكَ مِنۡهُمۡ أَجۡمَعِينَ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: la-amla-anna jahannama minka wamimman tabiʿaka min'hum ajmaʿīna
